Title: Friday Killer
Actors: Ploy Jindachote, Jaran 'See Tao' Petcharoen, Suthep Po-ngam, Apinya Sakuljaroensuk
Plot: Pae Uzi is a professional hitman who was release from prison. He learns for the first time he has a daughter, Dao. The tables are turned when his daughter tries to kill him, because she thinks he killed the only father that she ever knew.
